name: Fingers' Dating
description: Classic elimination + CG casual game, I hope the explosive effect of elimination and beautiful CG can bring you a feeling of relaxation. Use the mouse to move the position of the block to form 3 or more identical and continuous blocks, which can be eliminated. 5 identical and continuous squares can generate 1 landmine, exchange the position of the landmine with any square around it, you can eliminate all the same squares as the exchanged squares, which will achieve the best elimination effect.
